ygData.subject: Re: Some Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Where does one get a Foremans tunic can it be bought or is it found on a NPC if it can be bought where and how much if its off a NPC which one and where and
ygData.messageBody:
Where does one get a Foremans tunic can it be bought or is it found on a NPC
if it can be bought where and how much
if its off a NPC
which one and where and how often does it come up
----- Original Message -----
From: Guillaume Voizard <gvoizard@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, November 27, 1999 2:32 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Some Questions


> From: Guillaume Voizard <gvoizard@...>
>
> >1) I managed to buy some Cured Silk Armor for a
> >relativily low price. So my choice is between Cured
> >Silk Gi or Foreman's tunic. Any input?
>
> Everybody will told you the Foreman tunic is better. And it is true. But I
> don't like the look, so I will try to keep my Cured Silk Gi as long as I
> can. ;o)
>
> Tsin Suchiko
> 34th rank, Tunare
